author: Ryan Daws
description:
The folks behind Rust-based AV1 video decoder rav1d are looking for developers to get it running as fast as its C-based cousin, dav1d. It all kicked off back in March 2023. The plan? Build a high-performance AV1 decoder, but with all the memory safety goodness Rust brings. They teamed up with Immunant for the heavy... Read more »

The post Rust developers offered $20k for rav1d to reach C performance appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Rust developers offered $20k for rav1d to reach C performance
